tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_waste_warnings (
  sensor_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  location_id INT,
  waste_level INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterConsumption (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  flow_rate NUMERIC,
  usage_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE WarningLog (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  warning_type VARCHAR(50),
  warning_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AlertRecipient (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  notification_preference VARCHAR(20),
  location_interest VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    water_usage FLOAT
)
